METADATA.TITLE: Santeri Ora
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: Check Santeri's experience and latest ventures in full-stack development and entrepreneurship.

HOME.HEADING: Welcome to My Portfolio
HOME.INTRO_P1: Hi, I'm Santeri Ora, a Lean-driven full-stack developer and a second-time founder. I specialize in building scalable web applications, combining deep technical expertise with a strong business understanding.
HOME.INTRO_P2: I graduated at the end of 2025 with a Master's degree in Computer Science from Tampere University. Currently, I am focused on scaling my company, Superwider, where I am building a data-driven platform that automates performance-based influencer marketing through social media integrations.
HOME.INTRO_P3: I'm passionate about solving complex technical challenges and turning business needs into efficient software solutions. Let's connect, and don't forget to check out Superwider!
HOME.QUIZ_SECTION_TITLE: Need a New Website or Other Software Service?

METADATA.TITLE: Software Services
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: Results-driven and comprehensive development for modern web products. My service is designed to bridge the gap between limited "no-code" setups and expensive, often rigid software agencies. I provide a functional, launch-ready version within 1 to 2 weeks. This is followed by a round of edits based on your feedback and a final polish to ensure a flawless result for the official launch.

SERVICES.TITLE: Software Services
SERVICES.INTRO: Results-driven and comprehensive development for modern web products. My service is designed to bridge the gap between limited "no-code" setups and expensive, often rigid software agencies. I provide a functional, launch-ready version within 1 to 2 weeks. This is followed by a round of edits based on your feedback and a final polish to ensure a flawless result for the official launch. See below how this fast and expert approach helps your business grow.

SECTION_1.TITLE: Engineering & Development
SECTION_1.SUBTITLE: I build unique websites for businesses that demand high-performance, professional digital solutions. These are not generic templates: every site is built to support your brand and sales goals.

BENEFIT_1.TITLE: Peak Performance:
BENEFIT_1.DESCRIPTION: I optimize performance and user experience for best customer satisfaction and search engine visibility.

BENEFIT_2.TITLE: Seamless Mobile Experience:
BENEFIT_2.DESCRIPTION: Your site will work and look great on every screen size from the smallest smartphones to the largest desktops.

BENEFIT_3.TITLE: Scalable Architecture:
BENEFIT_3.DESCRIPTION: The code is built to grow with your business. Adding new features is effortless and free of the technical roadblocks typical of "drag and drop" builders.

BENEFIT_4.TITLE: Search-Optimized Code:
BENEFIT_4.DESCRIPTION: Professional coding standards ensure Google reads your site correctly, which improves your rankings in search results.

SERVICE_1.TITLE: Custom Websites & Apps
SERVICE_1.LEAD: I build unique solutions from the ground up to ensure your site has no technical roadblocks and is optimized to reach more customers.
SERVICE_1.DESCRIPTION: Every line of code is written to support your specific sales goals. By using scalable architecture, I ensure your site performs at its peak on both mobile and desktop, providing a professional experience that generic templates cannot match.
SERVICE_1.EXAMPLE: A high-performance web application designed for seamless growth and demanding integrations.

SERVICE_2.TITLE: Website Modernization
SERVICE_2.LEAD: Transform your slow or outdated site into a powerful tool in half the usual time.
SERVICE_2.DESCRIPTION: Rebuilding is more profitable than patching old code. I use your current website as a map to deliver a superior version with modernized features and a fresh user experience, getting you to market faster than starting from scratch.
SERVICE_2.EXAMPLE: A legacy business site transformed into a modern tool for high-speed customer acquisition.

SECTION_2.TITLE: E-commerce & SEO
SECTION_2.SUBTITLE: I build growth-focused commerce and search engine visibility systems that turn traffic into revenue, combining reliable storefronts with search strategies that scale.

SERVICE_1.TITLE: Shopify E-commerce Solutions
SERVICE_1.LEAD: Launch a professional online store with automated security and tools built for high growth.
SERVICE_1.DESCRIPTION: I handle the technical setup from payment methods to shipping options. You get a secure, easy to manage foundation that can handle thousands of orders, allowing you to focus on your business while the platform handles the updates.

BENEFIT_1.TITLE: Cost-Efficient:
BENEFIT_1.DESCRIPTION: Get a high-end store without the massive investment required for custom-built commerce software.

BENEFIT_2.TITLE: Automated Security:
BENEFIT_2.DESCRIPTION: The platform handles security and updates automatically so you can focus on your business.

BENEFIT_3.TITLE: Built for Growth:
BENEFIT_3.DESCRIPTION: The system supports your business from your first order up to tens of thousands of orders per month.

SERVICE_1.EXAMPLE: A modern shopping experience designed to turn social media traffic into direct revenue.

SERVICE_2.TITLE: Strategic & Technical SEO
SERVICE_2.LEAD: A comprehensive growth package designed to outpace rivals by turning search intent into revenue.
SERVICE_2.DESCRIPTION: This service pairs deep technical optimization with a clear growth strategy. I map real customer intent, remove performance and indexing barriers, and build a scalable content and authority plan that compounds visibility over time.

ITEM_1.TITLE: Competitor & Search Term Analysis:
ITEM_1.DESCRIPTION: I analyze exactly what your rivals are doing to identify the high-value keywords your customers are actually using.

ITEM_2.TITLE: Content Planning & Creation:
ITEM_2.DESCRIPTION: I handle the strategy and production of search-optimized content that builds trust with your audience and search engines.

ITEM_3.TITLE: Link Building & Digital Reputation:
ITEM_3.DESCRIPTION: I strengthen your authority by securing links from reputable websites to ensure you stay at the top of search and AI results.

ITEM_4.TITLE: Automated Visibility Systems:
ITEM_4.DESCRIPTION: For custom projects, I build technical systems that automatically expand your reach across thousands of relevant search terms.

SERVICE_2.EXAMPLE: A platform built for maximum visibility using a professional linking strategy and targeted content.

WHY_ME.TITLE: Why Work With Me
WHY_ME.SUBTITLE: I focus on delivering professional results without unnecessary bureaucracy, delays, or technical limitations.

REASON_1.TITLE: Fast Delivery (2–4 Weeks)
REASON_1.DESCRIPTION: While traditional software agencies often take months to launch a single project, I deliver your first version in 1 to 2 weeks. This draft is fully functional and ready to go live. My iterative development model ensures you see progress in real time and allows us to make adjustments based on real-world use.

REASON_2.TITLE: Engineering Quality vs. Basic Tools
REASON_2.DESCRIPTION: Many providers rely solely on visual no-code tools. While fast to set up, they often result in slow and limited websites. I use the same coding standards as the world's leading tech companies. This ensures your site is faster, more secure, and performs at a level that basic builders cannot reach.

REASON_3.TITLE: Low Maintenance Costs
REASON_3.DESCRIPTION: Poorly built sites lead to expensive technical issues. By building correctly from the start, I ensure your site remains reliable and easy to manage. You skip high monthly fees and complex service integration costs. My maintenance is affordable: averaging only 20€ per month for professional hosting and security updates.

REASON_4.TITLE: Risk-Free 1 Year Warranty
REASON_4.DESCRIPTION: I stand by the quality of my work. If any bugs or issues appear within the first year, I will fix them free of charge. You can trust that your investment is protected by a professional engineer.

VALITAN.TITLE: Välitän LKV
VALITAN.DESCRIPTION: Service website with a focus on clarity and conversions.

INTRO.TITLE: Website Service Discovery Quiz
INTRO.DESCRIPTION: Answer a few quick questions to discover which website services best match your business needs.

QUIZ.MAINTENANCE: Affordable professional maintenance starting from 20€ per month.
QUIZ.TIMELINE: First version ready to publish in 1 to 2 weeks.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to take the next step?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Let's work together to design a solution that helps your business reach its goals and grow.

Q1.QUESTION: Do you currently have an existing website?
Q1.OPTION_1: Yes, I have an old website
Q1.OPTION_2: No, I am starting from scratch

Q2.QUESTION: What is your primary goal for the project?
Q2.OPTION_1_SUB: Keep basic idea of the old website and modernize it's structure and content.
Q2.OPTION_2_SUB: Complete overhaul with new features and fresh content.

Q3.QUESTION: What kind of platform do you need?
Q3.OPTION_1_SUB: I want to showcase services/business and generate leads.
Q3.OPTION_2_SUB: I want to sell products and take payments online.

Q4.QUESTION: What is the estimated size of the website?

Q5.QUESTION: What is your primary goal regarding your audience?
Q5.OPTION_1_SUB: I have an existing customer base and do not need new ones.
Q5.OPTION_2_SUB: I want to reach new customers from search engines and AI.

Q6.QUESTION: How competitive is your market?
Q6.OPTION_1_SUB: I have local or industry rivals I need to outperform.
Q6.OPTION_2_SUB: I don't have many direct competitors to worry about.

SHOPIFY.TITLE: Shopify E-commerce Solution
SHOPIFY.DESCRIPTION: Launch a professional online store at a fraction of the cost of custom coding. We handle everything from payment methods to shipping setup.

MODERNIZATION.TITLE: Website Modernization and Development
MODERNIZATION.DESCRIPTION: Rebuilding your outdated site is more profitable than patching old code. We use your current site as a map to deliver a superior version faster.

CUSTOM.TITLE: Custom Development
CUSTOM.DESCRIPTION: Professional digital solutions built from the ground up. These are not generic templates: we focus on performance and business goals.

SEO_SHOPIFY.TITLE: Strategic SEO
SEO_SHOPIFY.DESCRIPTION_AGGRESSIVE: Shopify handles the technical foundation automatically. We focus on strategic growth through competitor intelligence to turn searches into revenue.
SEO_SHOPIFY.DESCRIPTION_FOUNDATION: We maximize your Shopify store's potential by focusing on the keywords and content your current and future customers are looking for.

SEO_CUSTOM.TITLE: Strategic and Technical SEO
SEO_CUSTOM.DESCRIPTION_AGGRESSIVE: A growth package designed to outpace rivals. We build custom technical systems that automatically expand your visibility across a massive range of search terms, ensuring you are found by every possible customer.
SEO_CUSTOM.DESCRIPTION_FOUNDATION: A solid technical foundation makes your site a trusted leader in your industry. We combine this with active reputation building to ensure you stay authoritative and at the top of search results.
